sentence: Team president Leon Rose, executive vice president William Wesley and general manager Scott Perry have not spoken publicly since the start of training camp, but the remodeling of the roster in the summer has not worked as expected.
author: Steve Popper
title: Knicks lose to Lakers in overtime after taking 21-point lead

sentence: Knicks president Leon Rose and general manager Scott Perry stayed home to work the phones, while senior adviser William Wesley and executive Allan Houston are on the western journey.
author: Marc Berman
title: Knicks eyeing Kings’ Harrison Barnes as NBA trade deadline heats up

author: Steve Popper
title: Knicks stand pat as NBA trade deadline passes, then beat Golden State

author: Ian O'Connor
title: Leon Rose raising fresh doubts he knows what he’s doing in charge of Knicks
